entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story who suggests using decoys and Polyjuice Potion to the Order of the Phoenix. He wants Harry to present this idea as his own.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a character in the story who understands Snape's plan and agrees to it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story who is flying alongside Snape on a broomstick. He is accompanied by other Death Eaters and ahead of them are Lupin and another Harry (who is really George).

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a character in the story who is being targeted by a Death Eater with a wand.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a character in the story who is impersonated by another Harry using Polyjuice Potion.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is an organization that Snape suggests using decoys and Polyjuice Potion to.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: Polyjuice Potion is a magical object used in the story to impersonate George.

relationships.description: Snape suggests using decoys and Polyjuice Potion to the Order of the Phoenix.
Harry uses Polyjuice Potion to impersonate George.
Snape orders Mundungus to present his idea as his own.
A Death Eater targets Lupin with a wand.
Snape flies alongside Harry on a broomstick.
